problem_statement: Create an AWS Lambda function named 'hello_world' using the Go runtime (provided.al2). The Lambda code already exists in S3 bucket 'lambda-code-bucket' with key 'lambda.zip'. The function should have basic execution role with CloudWatch Logs permissions. Use the pre-existing S3 bucket for the Lambda deployment package.
hints: Use aws_lambda_function resource with S3 deployment
Directly reference the S3 bucket name 'lambda-code-bucket'
Lambda needs an IAM role with AssumeRole policy
Use provided.al2 runtime for Go Lambda with bootstrap handler
